title: Orange Essence
body:
I just got Elementalist Lux skin shard from a chest and I am so happy. But the price of 2950 Orange Essence is a lot. I know you get from disenchanting other skin shards but I really would really like to reroll them instead. 
So... Will there be any events where in you can get it from chests or from completing missions? Or can you get it from honor capsules? Thank you for reading this.

replies.body: You can get a small amount of bonus essence every once and awhile from chests, but so far the quickest and best way to get Orange Essence is by disenchanting other skin shards.
